name: HappyLine
description:
Explore new worlds as you tap with the easy 1 control system and listen to the beautiful music!

How to Play

To control the player, click with a mouse or tap the screen. You can also click the space bar to turn. There is only 1 control in this fun game! There is only 1 rule: Do not touch obstacles!

Future Updates

In the future, more levels will be made for everyone to enjoy! The shop and profile settings will come soon too! Enjoy the game!
